title: Infinite Loop Detected
description: This bug traps programs in a relentless cycle, consuming time and sanity until all logic breaks down.

title: Keyboard Not Found
description: A mischievous glitch that disables input entirely—perfect for silencing panicked users mid-debug.

title: 404 Coffee Not Found
description: A critical error in developer productivity—caused by an empty mug and shattered dreams.

title: Unexpected Response
description: The wildcard menace that sends cryptic replies, breaking APIs and confusing even the most seasoned devs.
